com.stripe.android.exception

Class CardException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.stripe.android.exception.StripeException
          • com.stripe.android.exception.CardException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CardException
extends StripeException
    An Exception indicating that there is a problem with a Card used for a request. Card errors are the most common type of error you should expect to handle. They result when the user enters a card that can't be charged for some reason.
    See Also:
